$description:
| What does this do? | Enables internal phishing protection for Microsoft Forms. |
| Why should you use this? | Prevents attackers from using forms for phishing attacks by asking personal or other sensitive information. |
| What is the end-user impact? | If potential phishing is detected, the form will be blocked. |
| Learn more | [Microsoft Forms](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-forms/review-unblock-forms-users-detected-blocked-potential-phishing) |
